rata muhunadena pa්radhana pa්rashnaya, enam dilindu bhawaye ihala mattama saha aadayam wishamathawa pilibanda pa්rashnaya wisandima sandaha sama pa්rajawakatama samana ayithin pirinamana saha palathwalata balaya beda harena aluth aanduka්rama wyawasthawaka athi wadagathkama gana me piris nodannawa wiya hakiya. 2015 loka banku warthawa penwa dena paridi, 2012/2013 wasarawala lankawe janagahanayen siyayata 3.3 ka dainika aadayama wune dolar 1.25 kata adu mudalaki.
